markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instant Backup](/Feats.aspx?ID=3167) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 112</row>

**Trigger**
Your attack with a firearm misfires.

</column>

---

Even as your firearm misfires, you quickly draw a backup weapon. Release the misfired weapon if you so choose, and Interact to draw a one-handed weapon.
name: Instant Backup
